#include <stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
	int rev(int n){
int rem=0,t=n;
while(n>0){
rem = (rem*10) + (n%10);
n=n/10;
}
if(rem==t)
return 1;
else
return 0;
 
}
int main()
{
	int a,b,t,temp;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a;
	temp=a+1;
	while(!rev(temp))
	temp++;
		
		cout<<temp<<"\n";
	}
}
